Good Comments: Missing lines, even the most easiest lines are incorrect, also bad timing. Horrible group.

Even if subs/translations quality isn't so good I'm happy anyway to be able to hear original sound and read English subtitles. I've seen it as a child but with french/spanish dub and polish lector on it... It was worse :P
Bad Comments: very happy to re-watch this series, all i could find was spanish subs and spanish dubbed stuff so I'm very glad to watch any kind of fansub of this anime in english, as long as  I can tell what the heck is going on I approve :) watching anime raw isn't fu
